member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.DataServices.DataServiceCollection`1.OnResultsReceived(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Called when the results arrive asynchronously from the server.
member.remarks: Since there is no guarantee that this method will be invoked on the UI thread, we have to marshal the response operation back to the main application thread (the UI thread). Code that accesses entities, accesses the DataServiceContext or enumerates results of LINQ queries needs to happen on the UI thread.

member.returns: true if the URI ends in an opening bracket, one or more digits and a closing bracket, i.e. something like "...Customers(1)" getting the first customer.
member.remarks: Using a entity key to select a single entity (see rules: collectionNavigation and keyPredicate) For example:

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDataServiceDataSource
member.summary: Provides an object for loading, paging, filtering, sorting and editing entities coming from a WCF Data Service.
member.remarks: Use this component to simplify the interaction between the user interface and data from a DataServiceContext. After specifying a DataServiceContext and QueryName, the RadDataServiceDataSource can load data and expose it through the DataView properties. This component also provides codeless integration with other data controls like RadGridView, RadDataPager and RadDataFilter.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDataServiceDataSource.AutoLoad
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Load is automatically invoked when a change occurs that impacts the query composed by the data source.
member.value: true if the data source is will automatically invoke Load when a change occurs that impacts the query composed by the data source; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDataServiceDataSource.LoadDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the delay before an automatic data loading operation is started.
member.value: The delay before an automatic data loading operation is started.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDataServiceDataSource.DataView
member.summary: Gets the current view of entities resulting from the last load operation, using a .
member.value: The current view of entities resulting from the last load operation.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDataServiceDataSource.CanLoad
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the control can perform a load operation based on the present state.
member.value: true if this instance can load data; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDataServiceDataSource.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of items displayed on each page of the view returned from Data, or 0 to disable paging. A non-zero page size will cause the number of entities loaded with each Load operation to be limited as well, using server-side paging.
member.value: The size of the page.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDataServiceDataSource.HasChanges
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the currently has any entities with pending changes.
member.value: true if has changes; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDataServiceDataSource.IsLoadingData
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether is currently loading data.
member.value: true if this instance is loading data; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDataServiceDataSource.IsSubmittingChanges
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether is currently submitting changes as a result of a call to .
member.value: true if this instance is submitting changes; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDataServiceDataSource.IsBusy
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dataService data source is busy (loading or submitting).
member.value: true if the dataService data source is busy; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDataServiceDataSource.DataServiceContext
member.summary: Gets or sets the WCF DataServiceContext instance used for executing the load and submit operations.
member.value: The WCF DataServiceContext.
member.remarks: The only supported DataServiceContext.MergeOption is MergeOption.OverwriteChanges. Setting the MergeOption to anything else will result in an InvalidOperationException.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadDataServiceDataSource.QueryName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the query to use for loading.
member.value: The name of the query to use for loading data.
member.remarks: The DataServiceContext will be searched for a method that returns an EntityQuery, with a name that matches the name provided to QueryName. The matched name can be with or without a "Query" suffix.
